wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Charles Thorpe  (born (1942-07-29)29 July 1942 in Cambridge) is a British retired ambassador.Thorpe was educated at The Leys School, Cambridge, and Christ's College, Cambridge, and entered the diplomatic service in 1965. He was the British Ambassador to the Philippines from 1995 to 1998, and Ambassador to Mexico from 1999 to 2002.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Mexico

response: Adrian Thorpe (born 25 November 1963), also known as Aidey Thorpe, is an English former footballer who made more than 150 Football League appearances playing as a winger or a forward.
